resources.string:
MoneyPit is an app which allows you to track and oversee the fuel cost and fuel economy of your car. The app supports among other things multiple cars, different currencyâ€™s, different units for distance and volume.

If you have questions, suggestions, comments or a bug to report please send us an email.

MoneyPit has been build with the help of the following components:

Material Design Dialogs
MPAndroidChart
